root.name: The Sims 3: Ambitions
root.description: OverviewThe second expansion pack for The Sims 3 promises to focus on sims career progression including the ability to control sims whilst they're at work. New jobs for The Sims 3 include: Firefighter, Architect, Tattoo Artist, Inventor, Private Investigator, Ghost Hunter, Stylist, Sculptor and Doctor.System RequirementsPC System Requirements:OS: Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista SP1 or Windows 7CPU: (XP) 2.0 GHz P4 processor or equivalent; (Vista and Windows 7) 2.4 GHz P4 processor or equivalentRAM: (XP) 1 GB RAM; (Vista and Windows 7) 1.5 GB RAMHARD DRIVE: At least 3.5 GB* of free space with at least 1 GB additional space for custom content and saved gamesVIDEO: DirectX 9.0c compatible Video Card with 128 MB of Video RAM and support for Pixel Shader 2.0*9.6 GB if installing with The Sims 3Supported Video Cards: Nvidia GeForce series: FX5900 or greater; ATI Radeon™ series: ATI Radeon 9500 series of greater; Intel® Graphics Media Accelerator (GMA): GMA 3-Series, GMA 4-Series.Please note that the GeForce 6100 and 7100 cards are not supported.Digital download is PC-compatible only
